WorkItem.ClosedComment: Does not look like a MUI issue. Check your SQL components install
WorkItem.Description:
I have just started using the Modern UI framework and I am using ModernWindow and ModernDialog, as well as ModernButton.

My problem is after building the application, it runs fine on my machine and all other machines with Visual Studio installed. However, when I try to deploy for business guys, the application does not run. It gives error. 

Naturally, I thought .Net framework 4.5 might not be installed on those machines. So I went ahead and did the install. After the install, restarted the application, I still get the same problem. below is the problem signature as displayed by Windows.

Problem signature:
  Problem Event Name:                        CLR20r3
  Problem Signature 01:                       ReportManager.exe
  Problem Signature 02:                       1.0.0.0
  Problem Signature 03:                       53bda48c
  Problem Signature 04:                       System.Data
  Problem Signature 05:                       4.0.30319.34209
  Problem Signature 06:                       53489aad
  Problem Signature 07:                       25bd
  Problem Signature 08:                       27
  Problem Signature 09:                       System.Data.SqlClient.Sql
  OS Version:                                          6.1.7601.2.1.0.256.48
  Locale ID:                                             1033
  Additional Information 1:                  0a9e
  Additional Information 2:                  0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789
  Additional Information 3:                  0a9e
  Additional Information 4:                  0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789

Please help me. 

Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Builds and Runs on my machine, but does not run when deployed
